Terms of Service

Last updated: 25/03/2025

1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using Trainedtails.com, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service (“Terms”). If you do not agree, please do not use our website.

2. Description of Service

Trainedtails.com provides information, resources, and promotional content related to dog training, including affiliate promotions and newsletters.

3. User Responsibilities

  • Accurate Information: You agree to provide accurate information when subscribing or interacting with our website.
  • Compliance: You agree to comply with all applicable laws and not misuse the website’s services.

4. Affiliate Disclosures

Our website includes affiliate links. This means we may receive a commission if you purchase products or services through these links. We strive to ensure that any recommended products or services are of high quality, but we make no guarantees and are not liable for any issues that arise from third-party products or services.

5. Intellectual Property

All content on Trainedtails.com, including text, images, and logos, is the property of Trainedtails.com or its content suppliers and is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not use any content without our express written permission.

6. Disclaimer of Warranties

The services provided on Trainedtails.com are offered “as is” and “as available” without any warranty of any kind. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or usefulness of any information provided.

7. Limitation of Liability

To the fullest extent permitted by law, Trainedtails.com shall not be liable for any damages arising from the use or inability to use our website or services, including direct, indirect, incidental, punitive, or consequential damages.

8. Termination

We reserve the right to suspend or terminate access to the website at our discretion, without notice, for conduct that violates these Terms or is harmful to other users or our business.

9. Modifications to Terms

We may revise these Terms at any time. The most current version will be posted on the website, and by continuing to use the site, you agree to be bound by the updated Terms.

10. Governing Law

These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the United States. Any disputes arising from these Terms will be resolved in the appropriate federal or state courts located in the United States.

11. Contact Information
